This may be a minute detail but this behaviour stays with you as it feels that the doctor actually cares about your well-being and is not treating you as a cash cow. review: I had to get the root canal treatment done Asap as the decayed tooth was hurting a lot, i contacted dr.Pamela, she helped me first with remedies to relieve pain as it was lockdown period and suggested to get the treatment done post two weeks. Initially it was fine but had to get the treatment done in between the lockdown thus requested ma'am and she understood the severity and took special permission to get the mall open(clinic) to do the RCT for my decayed tooth.I am very grateful to her for her timely help and post treatment I am feeling much better. I would recommend all my relatives and friends to contact Pamela ma'am for any dental issues.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words, I would always be more than happy to help my patients whenever possible and strive to give them the best of care and safe dental treatment.Take care,may you and your family stay healthy and happy !
